page.title: 07Egg Farm in Clun
page.content: Mr & Mrs F Williams, the owners of the egg farm in Clun, have 6000 hens. They produce 5500 eggs a day. Mr & Mrs Williams travel 25-30 miles a day to supply their customers. The farm consists of 3 sheds plus a new shed which is not yet in use. The eggs are sold, per doz., in the following sizes: size 1 80p, size 2 74p, size 3 66p, size 4 58p, size 5 52p, size 6 48p, size 7 40p, cracks 40p. The hens are crossbred. Mr & Mrs Williams have been in this business for 21 years. Each cage is 18 inches and contains 3 hens. The cages in the new shed are bigger. They do not breed their own hens. They are bought from Mr Williams of Five Turnings. The eggs are collected at 4pm each day.
